title: Club Founded
description: FC Barcelona was founded by a group of Swiss, English, and Catalan footballers led by Joan Gamper.

title: Camp Nou Opens
description: The iconic Camp Nou stadium was inaugurated, becoming the home of FC Barcelona.

title: Johan Cruyff Becomes Manager
description: Dutch legend Johan Cruyff took over as manager, ushering in the 'Dream Team' era.

title: First European Cup
description: Barça won their first European Cup at Wembley, defeating Sampdoria 1–0.

title: Ronaldinho Signs
description: Brazilian star Ronaldinho joined Barça, sparking a revival in the club's fortunes.

title: Sextuple Triumph
description: Under Pep Guardiola, Barça won all six possible titles in a single calendar year.

title: 6–1 PSG Comeback
description: Barcelona completed one of the greatest comebacks in football history against PSG in the Champions League.

title: Messi Leaves
description: Lionel Messi, after 21 years at the club, left due to financial constraints.
